name: Balance
description:
You move across a narrow surface or uneven ground, 
attempting an Acrobatics check against its Balance DC. You 
are flat-footed while on a narrow surface or uneven ground.

effects.criticalSuccess: You move up to your Speed.
effects.success:
You move up to your Speed, treating it as difficult 
terrain (every 5 feet costs 10 feet of movement).
effects.failure:
You must remain stationary to keep your balance 
(wasting the action) or you fall. If you fall, your turn ends.
effects.criticalFailure: You fall and your turn ends.

rules:
You are in a square that contains a narrow 
surface, uneven ground, or another similar feature.
